abstract: British tabloid The Sun posts photo of topless woman on Twitter despite news reports that it had announced end of its tradition of publishing such images on paper's infamous page 3.
lead_paragraph: Its front page, posted online along with a preview of the topless woman, corrected other outlets’ reports that the paper was ending the feature.
snippet: Its front page, posted online along with a preview of the topless woman, corrected other outlets’ reports that the paper was ending the feature.

headline.main: Topless Photos Return to Page 3 of Britain’s Sun Tabloid
